s.text: This is the only implicit criticism of Thurmond, who voted the other way, but it is stated in entirely positive terms.
The succeeding scenes are more conventional, but Close's every appearance, in vivid color, completes the case.
The succeeding scenes are more conventional, but Close's every appearance, in vivid color, completes the case.
But avoiding the negative is a smart tack.
But avoiding the negative is a smart tack.
, the narrator praises the senator for serving South Carolina for "most of this century."
Back in his living room, Close promises to continue to do the one thing that everyone concedes Thurmond does well.
